__TOC__

Here is a list of wireless cards supported by Ubuntu. Please feel free to add to it.
Please put a yes/no under the version name. '''If you tested it on a beta, please say so.'''

For clarity's sake, please put '''yes''' in bold, ''unknown''s in italics and no's in normal text and sort them in alphabetical order, first by manufacturer and then model.
